thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Ms. MICHELLE SHAH
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Ms. MICHELLE SHAH

author: Ms. MICHELLE SHAH
title: Ms. MICHELLE SHAH
text:
My parents recommended Jerry Hoffman, from SkyLux for my reservation for my overseas vacation.
The service (sharing draft of my reservation, finding a low proce and help with seat selection) was above and beyond any service I have received
when booking anything over the phone or internet.
